doc.title: Cinedictum
doc.plot: 20 Cinematic Aphorisms. Each has a different story: 1. "Bad Idea" 2 min.11 sec. An affectionate couple is sitting in the park. A boy appears and watches them... 2. "Step Dance" 1 min.54 sec. Trading center. A man enters the restroom. A second man comes, and finding the door locked, waits nearby. He is soon joined by two others... 3. "Hurly-Burly" 1 min.49 sec. As a man walks down the street, his nose begins bleeding. He stops and tilts his head back. A second man sees him and looks up to see what he is staring at... 4. "Chain Reaction" 1 min.48 sec. People are sitting on a bench in the airport. One of them is reading a book, and he begins to laugh - harder and harder... 5. "Rival" 2 min.05 sec. A park bench. A young man is trying to win the affection of the young woman he loves. She is disinterested. A second young woman comes and talks to him... 6. "Taboo" 1 min.36 sec. A bathhouse. A man walks from the pool to the changing room and realizes that he's forgotten a towel. He observes everyone else with towels... 7. "Be Careful!" 1 min.36 sec. A bus stops. A young man moves to the exit. His wallet falls, but he does not notice. A young woman on the bus picks it up and returns it to him. The exchange smiles... 8. "Overdone" 1 min.31 sec. Morning. A man awakes. As he walks toward the bathroom, he pictures scenes from last night's party. He is still drunk. He reaches the bathroom and stares at his reflection in the mirror, still thinking of the party... 9. "Don Juan" 2 min.41 sec. A park. A young man is walking with his girlfriend. He holds an apple. He watches another young woman pass and sit on a bench... 10. "Temperaments" 2 min.43 sec. In each of the first four scenes a different man is sitting on a bench. His hat is near him on the bench. Troublemaker appears and sits on the hat... 11. "The Wine of Love" 2 min. 09 sec. A man is drinking wine in an open-air cafe. A plump woman is sitting nearby... 12. "Banking Operation" 1 min. 49 sec. A professional robber robs a bank. Then he gets in his car and leaves... 13. "Daddy with Baby" 2 min. 10 sec. A woman leaves her husband with their baby. Daddy starts playing with his baby... 14. "Full Circle" 1 min. 35 sec. A boss is shouting at his assistant. Then assistant is yelling at his woman-secretary. Then she is screaming at her daughter... 15. "Comedian" 1 min. 40 sec. A comedian is lost in thought. He is walking in his house, shouting at his wife, kicking his cat, and waiting for inspiration... 16. "Bureaucrat" 2 min. 39 sec. A Bureaucrat is reading something at his worktable. A citizen walks in to sign a document. Bureaucrat never notices him... 17. "The Image" 1 min. 56 sec. An artist finishes his new masterpiece. While preparing for the exhibition he finds his own appearance not quite artistic... 18. "Dialogue" 2 min. A phone rings. A man answers a call. A woman start talking... 19. "The Actor" 1 min. 46 sec. An actor accidentally kills himself during a play on the scene. Everyone is shocked... 20. "Found Guilty!" 1 min. 56 sec. Several young ladies are having fun on the beach. An old man approaches them and makes himself comfortable near them...
